channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @Fahrni That’s not what @davewiner is requesting. He’s suggesting that RSS readers support periodically visiting an OPML file, hosted on the Internet, that's maintained by someone, and when it’s updated, so is the subscription list in the consuming RSS reader.
@chron Major League Baseball should strip the Yankees of the the World Series championships they won in 2015 and 2016.

@spectator Rules of thumb: • I guarantee you they noticed that you’re staring. You just didn’t notice that they noticed. • You’re allowed to look, but take a mental picture if you want to remember it, then look at something else. • If you can tell they noticed you staring, then stop.

I gave a speech at our team meeting about dealing with things that have piled up, and mmmmmaybe it’s a “physician, heal thyself” situation.
At least I had the presence of mind to say “and when I say this, I’m talking to myself” a lot.

Tonight. https://t.co/u8i0S4JSnA
1-2-3 4th inning defensively for the Blue Jays. Shots are on me!
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/K8DbV9vFIp
Tyler Danish is another white baseball player whose name sounds delicious. I’m adding him to the list.
Red Sox win. https://t.co/kJZtvdVhtH
If the @wnbatoronto team isn’t called the Cicadas, then Toronto Metropolitan University should use it for their varsity squads. https://t.co/JO61E9DAkD
@seanorr HYFR!

@justagwailo Infuriating that this video is way better than the official documentation on how to do this. There’s no indication of an essential step in Sony’s guide. This doesn’t feel like a “better than nothing” situation.

Tonight. https://t.co/bxpxHhh3qY
You’ll never guess what Gosuke Katoh’s walk-up music is. When you find out, you’re honour-bound to play the whole song.
VAR is killing baseball.
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/YxIfDLUgoW
Shrimp alert in Toronto! @shrimpalert
May 28th? But I’m ready for it now! https://t.co/2KitKJ6Sns
I really enjoyed my train ride across the Golden Gate Bridge when I was in San Francisco a few years back. It was a highlight of my trip. https://t.co/J4AMCS7Lnt
@AnakanaSchofiel Epitome. It’s one of those words that’s both fun to say and fun to spell out loud.

Tonight. https://t.co/x1h3Yd4YpB
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/MxB05VQY90
@cantpredictball Bradley Zimmer bunt single.
Rally-killing grand slam.
Lourdes Gurriel Jr. is a single and a triple away from the cycle, and those are the easiest hits to get.
VAR is killing baseball.
Blue Jays win! https://t.co/1y6a900mJI
@toddsieling I know someone who’s still been using that particular service this whole time, and that fact totally matches up with what I know about that person.
I’ll see you over at Mastodon. https://t.co/A8ToqGOE0W

@nsylianteng Unordered list if they’re not instructions (with the most important point at the top), numbered list if it’s instructions. Sometimes, every now and then, a numbered list if I think the reader will use that as a reference for responding to my points, but that’s pretty rare.

If you’re going to quit Twitter, but still keep your account active, be sure to review your connected apps before you stop using it. If you don’t recognize the app or the app is defunct, revoke its access from your account. https://t.co/wbybXlLMV1
A reason to keep your Twitter account active even if you quit using it is that all of your tweets embedded on websites will disappear. https://t.co/3nlXSjR4pp
@rcousine I could also create a “Rulers Twitter” list and make that my home timeline (some apps let you do that). 🤔
I wish I could split off to Rulers Twitter. https://t.co/aUl1r250QK
I’ll see you over at Mastodon. https://t.co/xl68zwxXB6

@syncros @masseyhall A friend went to a concert there recently and he was quite impressed by the renovations, especially the sound quality. And this is a guy who is hard to impress. Are you going to a show there soon?
Holy cow.
I do not. https://t.co/slVhEssBnO
A week today: I run in the @torontomarathon 5k. #TorontoMarathon (May 1) https://t.co/Pa2Ftidbap
@AnakanaSchofiel From the clips of Succession I’ve seen, he plays basically the same character as on The Big Short. Which makes me want to watch Succession.
